title: The Miraculous Mellops 2. Part 4
creator_credit: Millenium Pictures, Film Australia, Posie Graeme-Evans and Karl Zwicky
brief_description: The Mellops encounter black holes, compressed suns and the anti-matter paperbag. An encounter with an anti-universe has everyone feeling not quite themselves. The Grubs continue on their gluttonous path, eating a now toffeeized Opera House model and making preparations to come to earth for a party at the plant nursery.
creator_credit_for_label: Millenium Pictures, Film Australia, Posie Graeme-Evans and Karl Zwicky
